WaitForJobCompletionAsync(String, Nullable<TimeSpan>, Nullable<TimeSpan>) WaitForJobCompletionAsync(String, Nullable(Of TimeSpan), Nullable(Of TimeSpan))

Edit

Wait for completion of a Job.

Task<JobGetResponse> WaitForJobCompletionAsync(string jobId, TimeSpan? duration, TimeSpan? waitInterval)Function WaitForJobCompletionAsync(jobId As String, duration As TimeSpan?, waitInterval As TimeSpan?) As Task(Of JobGetResponse)
Parameters
jobId
String String

Required. The id of the job.

duration
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

Optional. The maximum duration to wait for completion of job before returning to client. If not passed then wait till job is completed.

waitInterval
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

Optional. The interval to poll for job status. The default value is set from DefaultPollInterval property of HDInsight job management client.

Returns
Task<JobGetResponse> Task(Of JobGetResponse)
